library.io

Class BookFileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • library.io.BaseFileHandler<Book>
      • library.io.BookFileHandler

  • public class BookFileHandler
extends BaseFileHandler<Book>
    This class takes care of the Book File, based in the file Handler

      returns the name of the file so the base file handler will handle the correct CSV File

      returns the head of the file to validate the file

      this method will split the line and return one Book object
